column4: Multiple collisions in the Lexington / Fayette Co area.
Use extreme caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
Various bridges and overpasses on New Circle Rd and other areas have been reported to be extremely hazardous.

column3: Georgetown Rd between Kearney Rd and Iron Works Pike:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions to allow salt trucks to treat the roadway.

column3: Inner loop New Circle Rd at Versailles Rd / Update:
column4: The roadway is back open at this time.
